execution_plan.description: Read all items: receipt number and item identifier from the items service.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt AS s1__Receipt, Item AS s1__Item FROM items

execution_plan.description: Read all receipts: receipt number and customer id from the receipts service.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber AS s2__ReceiptNumber, CustomerId AS s2__CustomerId FROM receipts

execution_plan.description: Read goods mapping: goods id to food type from the goods service.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS s3__id, food AS s3__food FROM goods
